author: Vincenzo Errico
description: Think Negroni but with citrus freshness and grape fruitiness.
name: Enzoni
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
